category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAssignPropertiesInContext
preference.preference_description:
Defines the internal BOMLine property names which will be copied from Engineering Bill of Material(EBOM) to Manufacturing Bill of Material(MBOM), if the property is defined in-context in EBOM. Currently, the only allowed value is: bl_plmxml_abs_xform.
Teamcenter needs to be restarted for any value change to take effect.
